Megatron was nearing the colder waters of the Arctic, so many thoughts
racing through his mind, as well as the constant warning to low energon.
"Computer, redirect all weapon power to life support systems" he commanded.
The computer agnoliged him.

Was Galvatron dead? It was a strong posibility, if he was though, Megatron
could start to rebuild his lost empire, without that idiots medeling. He
neared the Ice caps, and started to move towards the large bodies of Ice,
he needed energon badly, he would not survive long. He saw a large wall of
ice, that had strong readings of being rich in energon. But as he neared
the wall of ice, he noticed it looked like it had been freshly broken, and
his readings showed a faint source of already burnt energy. He thought long
and hard to what it could be, and landed on the ground, almost falling from
depletion.
